title: Mobile Learning Design Based on Multi-literacy for Literature Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A mobile-based literature education design course for working professionals (elementary school teachers).

learning_goals: Analyze and interpret literary works across multiple media (text, image, audio)
Design science-integrated literary learning objects using a multiliteracy approach
Cultivate collaborative skills to conduct project-based assessments in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
